title: Walk - Walk - Walk
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Australia - Armed forces
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Veterans - Australia
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Vietnam War, 1961-1975 - Australia
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Vietnam War, 1961-1975
abstract: "It sounds strange but during all the time in the jungle, we still managed to have fun. I walked out of Vietnam and I am still walking today."
description: In 1966 Paul was playing in a band, 'The Castaways', the next minute he was conscripted to service in Vietnam. When Paul arrived in Vietnam he was told, "You're in the infantry now, you will walk, and walk, and walk some more. You had to keep on moving, that was how you got through."
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002738; In our words: stories from Victorian veterans; Active; 2011
